code: import{applyMiddleware,combineReducers,compose,createStore}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import initialState from"./initialState";import{tablesReducer}from"./tablesRedux";var subreducers={tables:tablesReducer,statuses:tablesReducer};var reducer=combineReducers(subreducers);var store=createStore(reducer,initialState,compose(applyMiddleware(thunk),window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__?window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__():function(f){return f;}));export default store;
